name: Frank Weathers
descriptions: Frank Weathers is a former farmer and refugee living in the Aerotech Office Park in 2281.
A former farmer hailing from Junktown, where he owned over 100 acres (0.4 square kilometers),

This frustration, coupled with him eventually losing his job, caused him to abuse his family, beating his wife and children for the slightest problem. His drinking problem compounded the issues to the point that he was forced to seek help from the Followers of the Apocalypse at the Old Mormon Fort, getting kicked out in the process.
As of his residence in Aerotech, his personality still reflects the same abuser who drove his family off.
After completing Left My Heart, the Courier can make him commit suicide through a Speech check (35). However, if they complete Left My Heart without talking to Frank, he can't be spoken to afterward.

topics.response_text: Dammit, I'll find them eventually! Mark my words!

topics.topic_text: Wow, some protector you turned out to be.
topics.response_text: Go ahead, mock me. Nothing you say can be worse than my own shame.

topics.topic_text: I'm so sorry. Can I help?
topics.response_text: You'd do that for a complete stranger? Thank you, friend. The army says they don't have the available manpower - as if this city is more important.

topics.topic_text: Wait a minute - why didn't they take you, too?
topics.response_text: I... God help me, I ran! I abandoned my family to those butchers. Not a day goes by I don't hate myself for that.
Oh God no! I haven't been the best father, but I didn't deserve this!

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry. She didn't make it.
topics.response_text: Oh. Oh, I see. Well... thank you for saving my children, at least.
My name's Frank Weathers. I'm a farmer, got a few hundred acres near Junktown. Well, I was a farmer. I guess I'm not much of anything now.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the Legion?
Why'd you come all the way out to New Vegas?
topics.response_text: Why does anybody? I thought I'd strike it rich at the tables, make my fortune and never have to plow those damn fields again.
We were crossing the Mojave, not far from Searchlight, when a band of Caesar's Legion slavers came out of nowhere. They took my family.

topics.topic_text: Your family doesn't want you around. You need to clean up, Frank.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're right. I've been a mean son of a bitch the past couple years.

topics.topic_text: Why would I tell an abusive bastard like you?
Show me some caps and I'll tell you exactly where to go.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Here, I don't have much left at this point. Please, just tell me where they are.

topics.topic_text: Hey thanks, Frank. Go to hell.
topics.response_text: Dammit, I'll find them eventually! Mark my words!

topics.topic_text: You're a slimy yellow-bellied bastard. You don't deserve a family!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're right. I've been a mean son of a bitch the past couple years.

topics.topic_text: They mentioned going to the Old Mormon Fort in Freeside.
topics.response_text: Crap, those goody-goodies kicked me out of there once already. No way I'm getting in.

topics.topic_text: Think about it, Frank. What do you have to live for?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're right. I've got nothing left...
